name: @db-ux/core-components
author: General technical components out of DB UX Design System (Version 3)

scripts.compile:angular: mitosis build --config configs/angular/mitosis.config.cjs && tsx scripts/exec/angular.ts && cpr ../../output/tmp/angular/src ../../output/angular/src --overwrite
scripts.compile:react: mitosis build --config configs/react/mitosis.config.cjs && tsx scripts/exec/react.ts && cpr ../../output/tmp/react/src ../../output/react/src --overwrite
scripts.compile:stencil: mitosis build --config configs/stencil/mitosis.config.cjs && tsx scripts/exec/stencil.ts && cpr ../../output/tmp/stencil/src ../../output/stencil/src --overwrite
scripts.compile:vue: mitosis build --config configs/vue/mitosis.config.cjs && tsx scripts/exec/vue.ts && cpr ../../output/tmp/vue/src ../../output/vue/src --overwrite
scripts.dev:angular: nodemon --watch src --watch scripts --ext tsx,ts --exec "npm run compile:angular"
scripts.dev:html: npm run copy-assets && npm run build-assets && npm run build-style:01_sass && vite --open
scripts.dev:react: nodemon --watch src --watch scripts --ext tsx,ts --exec "npm run compile:react"
scripts.dev:stencil: nodemon --watch src --watch scripts --ext tsx,ts --exec "npm run compile:stencil"
scripts.dev:vue: nodemon --watch src --watch scripts --ext tsx,ts --exec "npm run compile:vue"
scripts.start: nodemon --watch src --watch scripts --watch scripts --ext js,tsx,ts,scss,json --exec "npm run build"
